sentence.text: For those who thought BMW 's master plan was to make one car in three different sizes , the new 3-series must be a perplexing product .
This is why it is so perplexing .
The most perplexing thing is that the evidence shows that many bids are not a good idea .
Using a rather perplexing argument , Japan 's deputy finance minister complained with only a slight tinge of panic yesterday that the Nikkei should be at the 24,000 level .
I spent a perplexing evening in a Georgia bar some years ago endeavouring to persuade a local that I could NOT have driven from London .
Since then I have replaced the old leaky fuel pump which has given me a perplexing problem .
This development gave rise to a perplexing problem .
So powerful a mixture of love and rejection was both perplexing and formative , leaving the child uncertain where to attach his affections , and desperate in his search for acceptance and approval .
One perplexing feature of this conclusion is that since the late nineteenth century far fewer children with right hemisphere lesions are aphasic .
Can the perplexing unreliability of animal behaviour be taken as evidence for something more ( or perhaps less ) than machinery making decisions ?
The post mortem will be not less perplexing for the Liberal Democrats .
As with all Dizzy games , Crystal Kingdom is jam-packed with perplexing puzzles to solve .
Within families the complexity and inter-relatedness of expectation and need can appear to be a perplexing and entirely confusing maze .
Anselm had known Hugh as papal legate in France when he was abbot of Bec , but his close association with him came at a moment when he was in a very perplexing situation .
And , the most perplexing puzzle of all , just what is the phenomenal nature of the kingfisher 's experience as it gazes into the water ?
The dramatic desiccation of North Africa is a perplexing phenomenon .
This leads to some perplexing conclusions .
In the wider world , though Britain 's trading primacy remained universally recognized , perplexing questions of commercial influence and colonial domination presented themselves .
If it were n't so perplexing , it would be quite funny .
This does not mean they should be complex -- indeed complexity can be perplexing and therefore counterproductive .
There is a strain that is deeply perplexing .
She was in the shower when another , even more perplexing question suddenly popped into her mind .
